version_description:
• Autoplay - listen to all of the words and phrases in a topic's practice section. Great for learning completely hands-free.
• Transliteration can now be turned off in settings.
• 11 new languages:

Arabic (Moroccan) • Flemish • Georgian • German (Swiss) • Khmer • Kurdish (Kurmanji) • Luxembourgish • Maori • Tajiki • Welsh • Zulu

• Autoplay - listen to all of the words and phrases in a topic's practice section. Great for learning completely hands-free.
• Transliteration can now be turned off in settings.
• 11 new languages:

Arabic (Moroccan) • Flemish • Georgian • German (Swiss) • Khmer • Kurdish (Kurmanji) • Luxembourgish • Maori • Tajiki • Welsh • Zulu

• Try searching for words and phrases with Emoji!
• Phrase search speed has also been improved.
• Minor bug fixes.
• 8 new languages:

Sindhi • Punjabi (Pakistani) • Burmese • Oriya • Esperanto • Javanese • Ilocano • Pidgin (Nigerian)

• Try searching for words and phrases with Emoji!
• Phrase search speed has also been improved.
• Minor bug fixes.
• 8 new languages:

Sindhi • Punjabi (Pakistani) • Burmese • Oriya • Esperanto • Javanese • Ilocano • Pidgin (Nigerian)

● We <3 new languages! So we've added two more - Greenlandic and Indian English.
● We hate bugs. The software kind, not the insect kind. So those pesky software ones that we know about have been fixed!

Need help or spotted a problem? +44 (0)207 371 7711 is the only number you need to speak to a real, live human being anytime during UK office hours.
utalksupport@eurotalk.com ● @eurotalk ● fb.com/eurotalk

utalksupport@eurotalk.com ● @eurotalk ● fb.com/eurotalk

We've been super busy at uTalk HQ putting loads of new features into this update!
We hope you like it, and if you do - please let others know by leaving us a review :)
Any questions? We love helping people! All our contact details are below - just get in touch (as we aren't able to reply to reviews, sorry!)

- Introducing all-new Specials! Now you can buy single topics like golf, camping, driving and many more.
- New feature! Earn stars by playing more and unlocking achievements. Stars can be used to unlock Specials too!
- Fresh new design for in-app purchases and achievements, so you always know exactly what you’re going to get.
- Support for all new devices: iPad Pro, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPad Air 2 and iPad Mini 4.
- Like you, we can’t get enough of new languages, so we’ve added two more: Dzongkha and Lebanese Arabic.

Need help or spotted a problem? +44 (0)207 371 7711 is the only number you need to speak to a real, live human being anytime during UK office hours.
utalksupport@eurotalk.com ● @eurotalk ● fb.com/eurotalk

If you do please consider leaving us a review to let others know :)

Or if you prefer digital, we're available at utalksupport@eurotalk.com ● @eurotalk ● fb.com/eurotalk
